item.title: 据《日经新闻》报道，为应对关税，本田将采购丰田在美国生产的电池
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周一报道，日本汽车制造商本田汽车将从丰田汽车位于美国的工厂采购混合动力汽车电池，以降低特朗普政府的关税风险。【原文：Japanese automaker Honda Motor will procure batteries for its hybrid vehicles from Toyota Motor's plant in the United States in an effort to reduce tariff risks under the Trump administration, the Nikkei newspaper reported on Monday.】

item.title: VIEW 2 月零售销售增幅低于预期，1 月为负值
item.description: 美国 2 月份的零售销售额出现反弹，表明第一季度经济继续增长，但由于进口关税和联邦政府大规模裁员影响了人们的情绪，增长速度有所放缓。【原文：U.S. retail sales rebounded in February, suggesting that the economy continued to grow in the first quarter, though at a moderate pace as tariffs on imports and mass firings of federal government workers weigh on sentiment.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称，KKR-Warburg Pincus 集团提交了对 Gerresheimer 的非约束性收购要约
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，包括 KKR 和华平投资在内的一个财团已提交了一份对 Gerresheimer AG 的无约束力竞标书，该公司生产用于注射减肥药（如 Wegovy）的笔。【原文：A consortium including KKR and Warburg Pincus has submitted a non-binding bid for Gerresheimer AG , which makes pens used to inject weight loss drugs like Wegovy, two people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 普京下令授权美国对冲基金购买外资持有的俄罗斯证券
item.description: 周一的一项总统令显示，俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京已允许一家美国对冲基金从某些外国利益相关者手中购买俄罗斯公司的证券，并授权其未来将这些证券出售给两家俄罗斯基金。【原文：Russian President Vladimir Putin has given a U.S. hedge fund permission to buy securities in Russian companies from certain foreign stakeholders and authorised their future sale to two Russian funds, a presidential decree showed on Monday.】

item.title: Robinhood 推出预测市场，扩大博彩业务范围
item.description: 交易平台Robinhood周一在其应用程序中推出了一个预测市场中心，允许交易者对事件结果下注，包括美联储5月份基金利率的预期上限。【原文：Trading platform Robinhood on Monday launched a prediction markets hub in its app that allows traders to bet on event outcomes, including the expected upper limit of the Federal Reserve funds rate in May.】

item.title: 百事公司将以近 20 亿美元收购 "健康汽水 "品牌 Poppi
item.description: 百事公司周一表示，将以 19.5 亿美元的价格收购益生菌苏打水品牌 Poppi，扩大 "健康苏打水 "类别的业务。【原文：PepsiCo said on Monday it would buy prebiotic soda brand Poppi for $1.95 billion, expanding in the "healthier soda" category.】

item.title: 百事公司将以近 20 亿美元收购 "健康汽水 "品牌 Poppi
item.description: 百事公司周一表示，它将以 19.5 亿美元的价格收购益生菌苏打水品牌 Poppi，扩大 "健康苏打水 "类别。【原文：PepsiCo said on Monday it would buy prebiotic soda brand Poppi for $1.95 billion, expanding in the "healthier soda" category.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份零售销售温和反弹
item.description: 美国 2 月份的零售销售额出现反弹，表明第一季度经济继续增长，但由于进口关税和联邦政府大规模裁员影响了人们的情绪，增长速度有所放缓。【原文：U.S. retail sales rebounded in February, suggesting that the economy continued to grow in the first quarter, though at a moderate pace as tariffs on imports and mass firings of federal government workers weigh on sentiment.】

item.title: 纽约联储称纽约州 3 月份工厂活动大幅下滑
item.description: 周一的一项调查显示，本月纽约州的工厂活动创下近两年来的最大降幅，新订单大幅减少，投入品价格以两年多来最快的速度攀升，这是经济可能正在走弱的最新迹象。【原文：Factory activity in New York State plummeted this month by the most in nearly two years, a survey showed on Monday, with new orders falling sharply and input prices climbing at the fastest rate in more than two years in the latest sign the economy may be weakening.】

item.title: Stellantis 在意大利投资 4100 万美元生产电动汽车发动机零部件
item.description: 汽车制造商 Stellantis 周一表示，将向其位于意大利北部的 Verrone 工厂投资 3800 万欧元（4100 万美元），用于为即将推出的小型车型生产电动发动机零部件。【原文：Automaker Stellantis is investing 38 million euros ($41 million) in its Verrone plant in Northern Italy to manufacture parts for electric engines for its upcoming small-size models, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 与激进分子 Engaged 讨论后，Yeti 扩大董事会，增加两名董事
item.description: 生产冷藏箱和保温杯的户外用品公司 Yeti Holdings 周一表示，在与激进投资者 Engaged Capital 进行了数月的讨论后，公司将增加两名新董事并扩大董事会规模。【原文：Outdoor goods company Yeti Holdings , which makes cooler boxes and insulated cups, on Monday said it will add two new directors and expand the size of its board after months of discussions with activist investor Engaged Capital.】

item.title: 瑞银审计师就银行 2024 年财务报告控制措施发出警告
item.description: 瑞士信贷银行周一表示，由于未能解决从瑞士信贷继承下来的错报相关问题，该行的审计师对该行 2024 年财务报告的内部控制发表了 "负面意见"。【原文：UBS's auditors have expressed an "adverse opinion" on the bank's internal controls over its financial reporting for 2024, after it failed to resolve issues related to misstatements inherited from Credit Suisse, the Swiss lender said on Monday.】

item.title: 以色列向英国石油公司、索卡公司和 NewMed 公司颁发天然气勘探许可证
item.description: 以色列周一向英国石油公司（BP）、阿塞拜疆国家石油公司Socar和当地公司NewMed Energy颁发了在以色列水域勘探天然气的许可证，以增加国内天然气储备并扩大出口。【原文：Israel awarded licences to BP , Azeri national oil firm Socar and local company NewMed Energy on Monday to explore for natural gas in Israeli waters as the country seeks to boost domestic gas reserves and expand exports.】

item.title: 中国比亚迪推出充电更快的电动车平台，目标是建设超过 4000 个充电桩
item.description: 中国比亚迪周一推出了电动汽车升级平台，该平台采用 1000 伏架构，比亚迪称其电动汽车充电速度可与加油速度相媲美。【原文：China's BYD on Monday launched an upgraded platform for electric vehicles with 1,000-volt architecture that it said could charge EVs as fast as pumping gas.】

item.title: 科技公司必须开始保护英国用户免受非法内容侵害
item.description: 随着英国网络安全制度执行力度的加大，科技公司必须从下周一开始采取措施，保护用户免受儿童性虐待图片和其他非法内容的侵害。【原文：Tech companies must start putting in place measures to protect users from child sexual abuse images and other illegal content in Britain from Monday as enforcement of its online safety regime ramps up.】

item.title: Klarna 和 OnePay 在美国为沃尔玛购物者推出分期贷款合作项目
item.description: 瑞典支付公司 Klarna 周一表示，它将与消费金融应用 OnePay 合作，为在美国零售巨头沃尔玛购物提供分期贷款。【原文：Swedish payments firm Klarna said on Monday it is partnering with consumer finance app OnePay to offer installment loans for purchases at retail giant Walmart in the United States.】

item.title: 俄罗斯计划在 2030 年启动大规模锂生产
item.description: 俄罗斯自然资源部周一表示，俄罗斯计划在 2030 年生产至少 6 万吨碳酸锂，因为莫斯科正努力减少对进口的依赖，并提高高容量电动电池的产量。【原文：Russia plans to produce at least 60,000 metric tons of lithium carbonate in 2030, the natural resources ministry said on Monday, as Moscow seeks to reduce its dependency on imports and boost production of high-capacity electric batteries.】

item.title: 杜邦内部人士乔恩-肯普（Jon Kemp）将领导分拆后的电子部门
item.description: 化学品公司杜邦公司（DuPont De Nemours）周一表示，内部人士乔恩-肯普（Jon Kemp）将在计划分拆独立电子部门后接任该部门首席执行官一职。【原文：Chemicals firm DuPont De Nemours said on Monday insider Jon Kemp will take over as CEO of its independent electronics unit following the planned spinoff of the business.】

item.title: 穆迪下调大众汽车评级，原因是行业逆风和中国市场竞争加剧
item.description: 全球评级机构穆迪（Moody's）周一将大众汽车公司（VOWG_p.DE）的评级从 A3 下调一个等级至 Baa1，理由是该行业面临逆风、结构性挑战、持续的投资需求以及中国市场的激烈竞争。【原文：Global ratings agency Moody's on Monday downgraded Volkswagen VOWG_p.DE by one notch to Baa1 from A3, citing sector headwinds, structural challenges, ongoing need for investment and fierce competition in China.】

item.title: 美国司法部申请延长美国钢铁公司和新日铁公司在外国投资委员会诉讼案中的最后期限
item.description: 美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel）在周一提交的一份文件中表示，美国司法部上周提出动议，要求延长美国钢铁公司和新日本制铁公司（Nippon Steel）起诉外国投资委员会（CFIUS）的两个最后期限。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice filed a motion last week to extend two deadlines in U.S. Steel and Nippon Steel's lawsuit against the Committee on Foreign Investment (CFIUS), U.S. Steel said in a filing on Monday.】

item.title: 竞争加剧，英伟达首席执行官捍卫人工智能主导地位
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）本周将在该公司的年度软件开发者大会上发言，他将捍卫这家市值近 3 万亿美元的芯片公司的主导地位，因为该公司最大的客户面临着控制人工智能成本的压力。【原文：When Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang takes the stage this week for the company's annual software developer conference, he will defend his nearly $3 trillion chip company's dominance as pressure mounts on its biggest customers to rein in the costs of artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Stada 计划最快于周三启动 IPO
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士称，德国制药公司斯塔达计划最快于周三启动首次公开募股（IPO），这是对欧洲股票市场的一次考验。【原文：German pharma firm Stada plans to launch its initial public offering (IPO) as soon as Wednesday, two people familiar with the matter said, in a test for Europe's equity markets.】

item.title: 早间竞标美国零售业受到审查
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 防务公司 QinetiQ 警告称英国和美国的合同将延期授予
item.description: 英国防务与安全公司 QinetiQ 周一警告说，美国和英国政府最近换届后正在实施新的政策，短期合同的授予可能会出现延误。【原文：British defence and security company QinetiQ on Monday warned of delays in short-term contracts being awarded in the U.S. and UK, where new policies are being implemented after recent changes in government.】

item.title: Telegram 的杜罗夫：我回到迪拜了
item.description: Telegram 在俄罗斯出生的创始人兼首席执行官帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）周一表示，他已返回迪拜。【原文：Pavel Durov, the Russian-born founder and CEO of Telegram, said on Monday that he had returned to Dubai.】

item.title: 港口交易遭批评后，长江和记将不再举行盈利电话会议
item.description: 两位知情人士透露，总部位于香港的企业集团长江和记，因与贝莱德领导的财团达成港口交易而面临来自北京当局的压力，本周将不会召开财报会议。【原文：Hong Kong-based conglomerate CK Hutchison , which is facing pressure from Beijing authorities over a port deal with a BlackRock-led consortium, will not hold earnings conferences this week, two sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 特斯拉在中国推出辅助驾驶服务免费试用版
item.description: 特斯拉公司在其中国网站上表示，该公司将于 3 月 17 日至 4 月 16 日在中国推出完全自动驾驶服务的免费试用版。【原文：Tesla is launching a free trial of its Full Self-Driving service in China from March 17 to April 16, the company said on its Chinese website.】

item.title: 外国投资者被高收益的中国银行债务所吸引
item.description: 随着内地收益率的上升，外国投资者纷纷涌入中国银行间债务工具市场，寻求利用有利的货币兑换率优势，以及该市场与世界其他地区的低相关性所提供的庇护。【原文：Foreign investors are rushing into Chinese interbank debt instruments as mainland yields rise, seeking to exploit the advantage of favourable currency conversion rates and the refuge offered by the market's low correlation with the rest the world.】

item.title: 美联储即将召开会议，期指因财政部长的言论而下滑
item.description: 由于财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）的言论加剧了人们对经济放缓的不安，而美联储即将召开的会议又释放出与关税相关的信号，周一美国股指期货受到打击。【原文：U.S. stock index futures took a hit on Monday as Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent's comments added to unease about an economic slowdown, while focus was on tariff-related signals from the Federal Reserve's upcoming meeting.】

item.title: 白宫在 TikTok 出售交易中扮演的不寻常角色
item.description: 在备受关注的 TikTok 出售案中，白宫扮演了投资银行的角色，由副总统 JD Vance 负责拍卖。国家最高权力机构参与私人交易的程度前所未有，这也增加了达成协议的复杂性。【原文：In the closely watched sale of TikTok, the White House is playing the role of investment bank, with Vice President JD Vance running the auction. It is an unprecedented level of involvement in a private deal by the country's highest office that adds to the complexity of striking an agreement.】
